headline: Synchrony Financial (NYSE:SYF) Approves New US$2.5 Billion Share Buyback Program
summary: Synchrony Financial (NYSE:SYF) has seen its share price rise by 33% over the last month, influenced by several key developments. The company announced a significant new partnership with Texas A&M University Veterinary Medical Teaching Hospital, enhancing its CareCredit services in veterinary financing, and launched a private label credit card with Belle Tire, broadening its reach in auto-related financing. Additionally, Synchrony's decisions to increase dividends and authorize a new $2.5...
